name: phoenix-epsilon
description: Two-way chat between Discord and Minecraft Bedrock

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.json && npm run copy:assets && npm run copy:root-files && node modify-package.js
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run bundle
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run bundle
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run bundle
scripts.publish: npm run bundle && gh release create v$npm_package_version --title "PhoenixEpsilon v$npm_package_version" --generate-notes ./dist/phoenixepsilon-v$npm_package_version.zip
